Projects

AR Illustrations

Bringing some of my 2D illustrations to life with added dimensionality. I use Procreate to draw the initial illustration, and then export the layers into Swift playgrounds to adjust the rotation, tilt, and sizing of each layer.

Focus Orderer | Figma plugin

26k installs! Conceptualized, designed, and developed a Figma plugin to help designers / feature teams to annotate focus order of control elements for screen reader and keyboarding users.
